content.question: ​The function <math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="h open parentheses x close parentheses equals fraction numerator 2 x cubed over denominator x plus 3 end fraction minus fraction numerator 4 over denominator x minus 1 end fraction"><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac></math>. Which of the following statements is true?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math> is equivalent to <math alttext="fraction numerator 2 x to the power of 4 minus 2 x cubed minus 4 x minus 12 over denominator x squared plus 2 x minus 3 end fraction"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>12</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></math> and has the same end behavior as the graph of <math alttext="y equals 2 x squared"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>.

​<math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math> is equivalent to <math alttext="fraction numerator 2 x cubed minus 4 over denominator x squared plus 2 x minus 3 end fraction"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></math> and has the same end behavior as the graph of <math alttext="y equals 2 x"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></math>.

​<math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math> is equivalent to <math alttext="fraction numerator 2 x cubed over denominator x end fraction plus fraction numerator 2 x cubed over denominator 3 end fraction minus fraction numerator 4 over denominator x minus 1 end fraction"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></mrow><mi>x</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac></math> and has the same end behavior as the graph of <math alttext="y equals 2 x squared"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>.

​<math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math> is equivalent to <math alttext="fraction numerator 2 x squared minus 2 x minus 12 over denominator 3 x minus 3 end fraction"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>12</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></math> and has the same end behavior as the graph of <math alttext="y equals 2 x"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></math>.

content.answer: ​<math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math> is equivalent to <math alttext="fraction numerator 2 x to the power of 4 minus 2 x cubed minus 4 x minus 12 over denominator x squared plus 2 x minus 3 end fraction"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>12</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></math> and has the same end behavior as the graph of <math alttext="y equals 2 x squared"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
